reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, not itchy or rough, and appreciate its amazing fit and flattering silhouette, particularly for hourglass shapes. The dress is stretchy with plenty of room to move, and one customer describes it as "elegance on a budget." The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it great while others say it's too short. The material quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising the fabric while others find it cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Form fitting with great stretch. Beautiful vibrant color. Wore for 9 hours and was comfortable the whole time. Good quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress so much would definitely buy again.
items.body: I bought this dress for my baby shower n let me say the material is top tier the color is white white white.Fits my body perfect n very comfortable.The material is stretchy but d perfect amount to holds ur body.Very cute style . Read more
items.author: Ruth Baxter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond beautiful & long enough for tall girls!
items.body: This dress was everything I needed for my glamorous Christmas photos with my babies. I purchased 5 dresses because it’s really hard for me to purchase dresses lurch less online. I’m not a dress girl. Let’s make that real clear. I am a T-shirt and leggings/jeans type of girl, so I was really worried that none of them would be flattering or comfortable enough. I won’t lie, I loved every single dress that I ordered off Amazon. The quality was great, but we’re here to talk about this one. The one that I chose at the end of the day. It’s very stretchy and comfortable. The slit up the side is just sexy enough to keep you from showing off too much But still make you look like one hot mama. I wore a body shaper that’s basically like underwear that goes all the way up to the bottom of your bra because I didn’t want it to show through this fabric. It is thick and made really well but I knew that if I got anything like a corset style or anything super thick it would show through the dress for sure. some of you may not need that extra Shapeware but after two kids this mom needed just a little smoothing as it kind of shows all curves. Anyway, as far as length, it was almost too long, even with 6 inch heels and I am around 5’7”-5’8”ish without the heels. That’s one thing I loved about it because long dresses are usually too short on me. I also got these beautiful sparkly rhinestone heels off Amazon and they went beautifully with this dress. At the end of the day I highly recommend this dress as it’s really great quality, has a great stretch, really comfortable and so damn sexy! Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: I really liked the fit of this dress, its fitted but has stretch to it and felt comfortable all night. I wore very high heals so the length was good but if you're wearing low shoes you may need to have it hemmed I got a lot of compliments on this dress. The slit wasn't too high so no wardrobe malfunctions. Definitely wear seamless panties or none at all. It does hug the body and will show seems. Overall I loved it!! Read more
items.author: Michele Hoag

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So elegant and pretty
items.body: Love this dress! I’m 5’10 about 160plds and I got the xl in navy. Fit like a glove, and for once a dress long enough to floor even with two inch heels on! That’s hard to find when you’re tall lol. Great stretch material and comfy to wear! I got lots of compliments! So elegant! Bought a sparkly belt to put around the waist for some effect. :) Read more
items.author: Melissa S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, Love, LOVE This Dress!!
items.body: This dress is the bomb! As you can clearly see in my posted pictures! Lol. I purchased a medium as well as a large. With my recent 40lb weight gain, I wasn't to sure on which size. The large fit me comfortably, but it was too big in some areas like the breast (the top part flopped over) and the crotch area (Too baggy). The medium fits me like a glove! I Love, Love, LOVE this dress it is amazing! I received several compliments from men and women all night long! Lol. I got hit on, flirted with, etc. I am Not Single! Lol This dress is most definitely a head Turner! I was on the fence about purchasing, but it is the perfect little black dress to add to your closet! Okay, here are the deets, I'm 5 7" 194lbs, I usually wear a large, but in this case I'm glad I purchased the medium! The material does stretch but not too much, just enough to hug them curves! Lol. The arms weren't restricting and I didn't feel confined all night! I did wear a girdle just because of the curvature. If you're on the fence, I'd order. I'm glad I did! UPDATE: Came Back To Order Another In A Different Color For My Cruise!! Read more
items.author: Lee Wilson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was ok
items.body: I bought this dress for an event and it’s pretty but thin material so you can see throw it. But I was not hot in the dress either Read more
items.author: Heather Herrera

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall okay. Good for big breasted women
items.body: Me on the far right. I’m 5’0 curvy on top and bottom. I was wearing 5 inch heels in the photos. I wear a 36DD. The material was stretchy. I ordered a large to upsize but wished I got a medium. It’s definitely built for women with a longer torso because the back was scrunchy on me. The dress was not tight on me because I upsized but it still did hug the curves nicely. Overall not bad for a last minute order. Read more
items.author: Dillon Downard

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Evening High Split Formal Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Evening High Split Formal Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Winered, Navy, White, Rose, Royal Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
